src:
Didampingi Ibu, Iwan Bule Sampaikan Pernyataan Sebagai Ketua Baru PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 16:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan, yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule, resmi terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023. Menurut dia, doa sang ibu berperan penting mengantarnya menuju tampuk kepemimpinan PSSI.
"Ini berkat doa ibu saya," ujar Iwan Bule di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Saat Kongres Pemilihan PSSI masih berlangsung, Iwan Bule tiba-tiba keluar dari ruangan kongres. Ia mengantar sang ibu yang memakai kursi roda menuju pintu keluar Hotel Shangri-La.
"Ini bukan kemenangan saya. Tapi kemenangan insan sepak bola Indonesia tentunya," kata Iwan Bule.
Iwan Bule terpilih setelah meraih 82 dari 85 suara.
"Semua bertekad untuk memajukan sepak bola yang amat kami cintai. Saya sangat bersyukur," terangnya.
Iwan Bule berjanji akan memimpin PSSI dengan maksimal. Didukung oleh dua wakil ketua umum dan 12 voters, Sekretaris Utama Lembaga Pertahanan Nasional ini berjanji bakal membuat PSSI lebih baik lagi.
"Dari teman-teman voters, insan sepak bola, semuanya ini yang membuat kami untuk bekerja maksimal untuk PSSI dengan back-up mereka," imbuh Iwan Bule.
text:
Accompanied by Ibu, Iwan Bule Convey Statement as the New Chairperson of PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 16:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan, who is familiarly called Iwan Bule, was officially elected as General Chair of PSSI 2019-2023. According to him, the mother's prayer played an important role in bringing him to the leadership of PSSI.
"This is thanks to my mother's prayer," said Iwan Bule at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).
When the PSSI Election Congress was still in progress, Iwan Bule suddenly left the congress room. He drove his mother in a wheelchair to the exit of the Shangri-La Hotel.
"This is not my victory. But the victory of Indonesian soccer people, of course," said Iwan Bule.
Iwan Bule was chosen after winning 82 of 85 votes.
"All are determined to advance the football that we love very much. I am very grateful," he explained.
Iwan Bule promised to lead PSSI to the maximum. Supported by two deputy chairmen and 12 voters, the Main Secretary of the National Defense Agency promised to make PSSI even better.
"From our friends, voters, soccer people, all of these have made us work optimally for PSSI with their back-ups," added Iwan Bule.
